titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SEXUAL HEALTH AND HIV ACTIVITY HEALTH ISSUE (SNOMED CT) - Description

div.p: SEXUAL HEALTH AND HIV ACTIVITY HEALTH ISSUE (SNOMED CT) is the same as attribute CLINICAL TERMINOLOGY CODE.
SEXUAL HEALTH AND HIV ACTIVITY HEALTH ISSUE (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT EXPRESSION which is used to record a health issue identified at an attendance for a Sexual Health Service.
NOTE: SNOMED CT EXPRESSION constraint for Health Issue: (<404684003 or <243796009).
